**User story**
Because virtual spacecraft flight simulation is a fairly niche topic, there isn’t much diversity in users. Thus, the ’As a \<user\>’ segment of a traditional user story is omitted for simplicity.

**Progress**
- [ ] Pull request opened
- [ ] Pull request merged
- [ ] User testing done
